message.content:
cs.DC, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LO, cs.SY

This paper deals with the design of error-safe protocols in distributed systems, which is a core topic in the field of Distributed Computing (cs.DC). The paper also introduces a new variant of choreographic programming, which is a programming-language design approach (cs.PL). The paper discusses the interplay between failures and collective communications, which is a topic in Software Engineering (cs.SE). The paper also introduces a type system that ensures that choreographies can be realized despite changing availability conditions, which is a topic in Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO). Finally, the paper deals with Cyber-Physical Systems, which is a topic in Systems and Control (cs.SY).
